name: Ultimate Soldier
description:
"Ultimate Soldier" is a classic 2D side-scrolling platformer. You are a lone fighter who was thrown into the jungle. Defeat the enemies, get out of the dangerous jungle alive!

There are 3 types of weapons at your disposal: Pistol, Assoult riffle and Shotgun. Enemies are also armed with different weapons so be cautious!

Game Features
  • 2 war zones
  • 20 levels
  • Steam Achievements support
  • 3 types of enemies
  • Challenging gameplay
